mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of the state of Virginia: containing the counties, principal towns, railroads, rivers, canalsds & all other internal improvements / prepared by L. Bucholtz ; eng. by Ch. Ludwig
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Lithographed and published by Ritchie & Dunnavant
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 58 x 89 cm. fold. to 20 x 12 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This variant is printed within an elaborate border and does not have a plate number within the neatline at upper right corner.
Inset: View of Capitol Square, Richmond.
Folded into gilt and blindstamped black morocco covers.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Detached from covers; torn at upper left edge, into the bottom of the view of Capitol Square. Gift of C.S. Hutter.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Detached from covers; torn at upper left edge, into the bottom of the view of Capitol Square. Gift of C.S. Hutter.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia--Maps--19th century
